title: Our Thoughts Are With You
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Here, have this, Setsuna-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>What is this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Open it and take a look.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Okay...... Oh, it’s a lucky charm!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yup. It’s a lucky charm that will grant you your earnest wishes. Everyone from Aqours went to the shrine and wished for the success of Nijigaku’s live concert.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Everyone......? Th-Thank you so much!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Well, Setsuna-chan, I’m sure you and everyone will have great success regardless, but there’s no harm in asking the gods for help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I think the feelings of everyone in Aqours will give us more power than the gods.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, I’m glad to hear that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’m serious! I think everyone else in the club would agree. We’ll give it our all and put on a fantastic performance tomorrow. I’ll see you then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
